render-mode.text:
<script>
  $(function () {
    function onlyShow( a,b,c) {
        a.each(function (i, v) {
            var that = $(this);
            $(b).each(function (j, k) {
                if (i == k){
                    that.hide().find('input').removeAttr("required");
                }
            });
            $(c).each(function (l, m) {
                if(i == m){
                    that.show().find('input').attr("required", "required");
                }
            })
        })
    }
    var a = $("#CreateMrchnt_feeChargeMode").parent().parent().siblings(".form-group");
    onlyShow(a,[1,3],[2]);;//初始化
    $("#CreateMrchnt_feeChargeMode").on("change", function (){

        a.each(function (i, v) {
            if(i >=3 && i <= 7 ){
                $(this).find('input').val("");
            }
        })
        if($(this).val() === "FEE_CHARGE_MODE1"){
            onlyShow(a,[1,3],[2]);
        }
        if($(this).val() === "FEE_CHARGE_MODE2"){
            onlyShow(a,[2,3],[1]);
        }
        if($(this).val() === "FEE_CHARGE_MODE3"){
            onlyShow(a,[1,2],[3]);
        }
    })
})
</script>
